name: Be Cube (Demo)
description:
in a Dimension not far from your, willy, a blue cube with strangely spiky hair, has his life turned upside down when a strange race from space takes his friends to a gigantic space colony, now he will do anything to rescue them and  return to home.

          

embark on this out-of-this-world adventure with "willy" and truly understand what is be a cube.

Controls: Future Plans:

☆More levels

☆A lot of Bugs fixing

☆Upgrade de cutscenes and story

☆Upgrade animation of the characters

☆More bônus content

☆and much More!

☆Give me some ideias in the coments!
